component.name: Asunder
component.summary: Asunder is a graphical Audio CD ripper and encoder

description.p: Asunder is a graphical Audio CD ripper and encoder for Linux. You can use it to save tracks from an Audio CD as any of WAV, MP3, OGG, FLAC, Opus, WavPack, Musepack, AAC, and Monkey's Audio files.

ul.li: Can save audio tracks as WAV, MP3, Ogg Vorbis, FLAC, Opus, Wavpack, Musepack, AAC, and Monkey's audio files
Uses CDDB to name and tag each track.
Can encode to multiple formats in one session
Does not require a specific desktop environment

description.p: Caveat Emptor: The ARM builds only had limited testing because ARM devices with CD players are rare.
